WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Mentor_Options_Data.description: Wrapper element for Skill Item Proposal data.

validation.validation: Enter either a Skill Reference or a Skill Name.
validation.description: An existing Skill reference or a new Skill Name must be entered as part of the request.

validation.validation: Enter either a Skill Reference or Skill Name, but not both, when Remove Skill is selected.
validation.description: A Skill Reference or Skill Name must be part of the request when Remove Skill is selected but not both.

validation.validation: The Skill Item you have referenced is inactive.
validation.description: The referenced Skill Item must be active.

validation.validation: [SkillName] isn't the name for this skill item: [RefID]. Submit this skill with the correct name or leave the Skill Name field blank.
validation.description: The skill name doesn't match the name of the referenced skill item. Enter the correct skill name or leave it blank.

Mentor_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Mentor_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Mentor_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Boolean attribute identifying Available for Mentoring option
